string.name: EntryAbility_desc
string.value: HarmonyOS-driven Smart Life Assistant for the Elderly

string.name: login_help_message
string.value:
1. How to Register an Account?
Your account will be automatically registered when you log in for the first time using your phone number and verification code.

2. What Should I Do If I Forget My Password?
You can log in using a verification code and then change your password in the Personal Center.

3. Why Canâ€™t I Receive a Verification Code?
Currently, only 11-digit numeric phone numbers from Mainland China are supported for receiving verification codes.
